## Mercator-utstrekningspolygon

```ini
x             y
-20037508.34  -20037508.34
-20037508.34   20037508.34

 20037508.34  -20037508.34
 ```
## UTM 32-utstrekningspolygon

```ini
-2000000  3500000

 3545984  3500000
```
